title: Shark Punching Fun
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

+ **Gelb's SPC art**
[[==]]
Heyo, fellow humans. I have made a few [[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/spc-hub|SPC]]] artworks and gathered them here. Please feast your eyes and remember: 

[[=]]
[[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/bef5fe99-9fa1-4487-9414-032c9d3f0657/dgjz5mk-bb876ca5-1f86-48f2-a84c-5ab0145e411a.gif?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..uwsEu_n1rYIvrIbbPHMdnjj3fVaUT2TcJsSbwQDcrJ8 width="300px"]]
[[/=]]
[[=]]
**SEARCH.**       **PUNCH.**       **CONQUER.**
[[/=]]

[[include :scp-wiki:theme:spc]]

------

+ Paintings

These are my honest attempt at making art featuring motifs from the SPC universe. Enjoy.

[[collapsible show="+Down, Down to Selachian Town." hide="-Down, Down to Selachian Town."]]
[[=]]
[[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/bef5fe99-9fa1-4487-9414-032c9d3f0657/dgjz69z-dfcf93d0-f97e-4f56-9c4a-b3a7547c4fdd.png/v1/fit/w_750,h_1000,q_70,strp/diver_by_gelbsuchtie_dgjz69z-375w-2x.jpg?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.._b6XWuDulVeJVSRNtDBuaW7iufb6N7-ahkeaDvGFV7A width="550px"]]
[[/=]]
This painting shows an MFT Gamma-6 operative in deep sea shark-punching gear descending away from the warm light of day and towards the eerie glow of the selachian [[footnote]]**selachian**: the Centre's euphemism for shark. Also used as an adjective.[[/footnote]] settlement below. And yes: the title is a Hobbit reference. 

[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+The Grand Sharkist" hide="- The Grand Sharkist"]]
[[=]]
[[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/bef5fe99-9fa1-4487-9414-032c9d3f0657/dgjz5cp-2f44b026-ab98-4f6f-a470-85350fbb6fad.png/v1/fit/w_750,h_1000,q_70,strp/the_grand_sharkist_by_gelbsuchtie_dgjz5cp-375w-2x.jpg?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..m-AmBYyed5wctGBUzLMbi_MaDFRv1iwHSqmXhzeeOZg width="550px"]] 
[[/=]]
The Grand Sharkist, First Servant of the Mistaken Beast, Maker of Sharks, Founder of the Abysal Empires. This painting is based on an idea by [[*user Grigori Karpin]]. The [[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/spc-140|Sharkist]]] are the SPC's universe equivalent of the Sarkists, though much more successful.
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+Right Hook (cartoon style)" hide="-Right Hook (cartoon style)"]]
[[=]]
[[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/bef5fe99-9fa1-4487-9414-032c9d3f0657/dhxnjc5-1a5176e0-992f-411e-9e37-4ae79ddd49da.png/v1/fill/w_1032,h_774,q_70,strp/puncher_by_gelbsuchtie_dhxnjc5-pre.jpg?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..yIySFFWosZFoxsAOw1acYkORXGhvkd03ogaRrNts-Lc]]
[[/=]]
A pugilist in action. The SPC often strays into the cartoonish and silly - as does this painting.
[[/collapsible]]

+ Graphics from the Centre

Acquired directly from the Centre's database through extraversal diviniation these are pictures from the SPC universe. From technical drawings to shark-punching propaganda. 

[[collapsible show="+Recruitment Poster" hide="-recruitment poster"]]
[[=]]
[[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/bef5fe99-9fa1-4487-9414-032c9d3f0657/dgjz5wt-3471e0f0-3cf2-41a4-a40d-05b0d092ef88.png/v1/fit/w_750,h_1172,q_70,strp/spc_poster_by_gelbsuchtie_dgjz5wt-375w-2x.jpg?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..YQIRELxzQXJeg26C7LRt-Tl-Jb4Nv6d0JyXp4qTmzuk width="500"]]
[[/=]]
MFT is short for Marine Fighting Team - the SPC's universes equivalent to Mobile Task Forces just that instead of being specialists at containing they are specialists at, well, punching sharks.
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+Centre Power Armor" hide="-Centre Power Armor"]]
[[=]]
[[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/bef5fe99-9fa1-4487-9414-032c9d3f0657/dgp8t3p-b9fd07a5-5bff-474c-ad01-0babd9b569cc.png/v1/fit/w_750,h_1064,q_70,strp/hydroknock_fixed_by_gelbsuchtie_dgp8t3p-375w-2x.jpg?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..mp71yFg5uYGt4JLKzRcAThELRR6aAocLXcRgl6YpIjc width="550"]]
[[/=]]
The Centre is known to use (para-)technological means to enhance their shark-punching capabilities. Indeed that's what the SPC articles are all about. This specific armor is supposed to be a predecessor of the NEUROKNOCK armor used by the MFT CHARYBDIS in [[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/spc-507|this SPC article]]] by [[*user Lt Flops]].
[[/collapsible]]

+ MFT logos 

The Marine Fighting Teams â€“ the Centre's elite frogmen [[footnote]]**frogman:** A Marine Fighting Team operator, trained for combat while wearing underwater breathing equipment.[[/footnote]] and primere shark-punching force. Like the Foundation MTFs we all know and love these elite units need logos. I made some.

[[collapsible show="+MFT Alpha-1 "Red Right Hook"" hide="-MFT Alpha-1 "Red Right Hook""]]
[[=]]
[[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/bef5fe99-9fa1-4487-9414-032c9d3f0657/dgjz6gz-4a65fff3-7bc3-43dd-bb49-9ff69d2a35da.png/v1/fit/w_750,h_750,q_70,strp/red_right_hook_by_gelbsuchtie_dgjz6gz-375w-2x.jpg?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..2XbHM3cqOPnUi261tySXlDBAlkgyIKnm94pWKA52PcM width="550px"]]
[[/=]]
The best of the best, Alpha-1 is ORACLE's[[footnote]]**ORACLE**: the Centre's equivalent to the O5 council.[[/footnote]] very own Marine Fighting Team. Secretive and loyal beyond doubt they are among the few MFTs equipped to also engage nonselachian foes as they defend ORACLE against any threat.
[[/collapsible]]
[[collapsible show="+MFT Gamma-6 "Deep Strikers"" hide="-MFT Gamma-6 "Deep Strikers""]]
[[=]]
[[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/bef5fe99-9fa1-4487-9414-032c9d3f0657/dgjz6dq-592996bd-8940-4b57-b5c2-138759038c78.png/v1/fit/w_750,h_750/deepstrikers_by_gelbsuchtie_dgjz6dq-375w-2x.png?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..qCVX0ETRA0yDPbSGNHS1v4k9fMBa1c_DHWTjaM2BMi8 width="550px"]]
[[/=]]
The Deep Strikers specialise on punching sharks in the deep sea. They are equipped with state-of-the-art diving and punching gear.
[[/collapsible]]
[[collapsible show="+MFT Epsilon-11 "Nine-Hooked Fist"" hide="-MFT Epsilon-11 "Nine-Hooked Fist""]]
[[=]]
[[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/bef5fe99-9fa1-4487-9414-032c9d3f0657/dgjz6or-e50f8a66-dc9b-4ea8-9cf9-302816993908.png/v1/fit/w_750,h_750/nine_hooked_fist_by_gelbsuchtie_dgjz6or-375w-2x.png?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..DMjIu2NODAj27PfpLoG78ytM4R0ebcDXUQ6Rw4F_Fm0 width="550"]]
[[/=]]
Has your local Centre station been infiltrated by sharkists? Have the selachian entities you were studying mounted an escape? Are you terrified by [[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/the-spc-go-to-ikea-to-punch-sharks|the plushie your coworker bought from IKEA]]]? No problem! Just call the Nine-Hooked Fist and the issue //will// be punched. Repeatedly.
[[/collapsible]]

Now some people would say that MFTs shouldn't just be bad puns on existing MTFs so perhaps there will be some serious logos coming along. Watch out for that and so long!

[[/==]]
------
[[size smaller]]Credits: I have used the [[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/theme:spc|SPC theme]]] by [[*user PeppersGhost]]. Furthermore I'd like to credit all the amazing authors that have taken the Shark Punching Centre beyond a slapstick joke and made it into an inspiring world.[[/size]]
author: Gelbsucht_IE
